doc:
Shane Black https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shane_Black 0 Shane Black (born December 16, 1961) is an American filmmaker and actor. Black has written such films as Lethal Weapon and Lethal Weapon 2, The Monster Squad, The Last Boy Scout, Last Action Hero, and The Long Kiss Goodnight. As an actor, Black is best known for his role as Rick Hawkins in Predator (1987). He made his directorial debut with the film Kiss Kiss Bang Bang in 2005. Black went on to write and direct Iron Man 3 (2013), The Nice Guys (2016), and The Predator (2018). He is set to direct the upcoming film adaptation of Doc Savage. As of 2018, his film Iron Man 3 ranks as the seventeenth-highest-grossing film worldwide. Shane_Black ( born December_16_,_1961 ) is an_American_filmmaker_and_actor . Black has_written such_films as Lethal_Weapon and Lethal_Weapon_2 , The_Monster_Squad , The_Last_Boy_Scout , Last_Action_Hero , and The_Long_Kiss_Goodnight . As an_actor , Black is_best_known for his_role as Rick_Hawkins in Predator_(_1987_) . He made his_directorial_debut with the_film_Kiss Kiss Bang_Bang in 2005 . Black went on to_write_and_direct Iron_Man 3_(_2013_) , The_Nice_Guys ( 2016_) , and The_Predator_(_2018_) . He is_set_to_direct the_upcoming_film_adaptation of Doc_Savage . As of 2018 , his_film_Iron_Man 3 ranks as the_seventeenth-highest-grossing_film worldwide .
